title: How do I reduce my mobile data usage?
answer:
Disable the data service when you do not need it. 

 Disable data services if your phone is connected to a Wi-Fi network. 

 Access Wireless Access Protocol (WAP) sites instead of World Wide Web (WWW) websites. 

 Turn off data synchronization in the background: Go to Settings and touch More > Data usage. Touch the menu key and clear Auto-sync data.
